blog.name: groffiction
blog.title: Groffer's Lair
blog.description: Stucky, Kylux, Adjacent, Trevorcard, Garashir, Ship writer and artist.

title: Descension, Chapter 4
body:
Chapter 4 Excerpt:

“See? We are with you, Stevie. Until the end of the line, pal,” Bucky said, flushing a bit when the newly minted Alpha smiled a bit at that.

“Until the end of the line, it is,” Steve said, feeling as if a huge weight had been lifted from his shoulders.

Yea, it sucked, as Nat had said, about being betrayed. But, at the same time, it could always have been worse. At least he had two new mates that supported him, not just a ghost best friend.


I am on a roll! Hope you guys like the next chapter. Full Chapter 4: https://archiveofourown.org/works/18866476/chapters/45030700

title: Retirement Plans
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/30Lfblp

by twyly56

Henryk Gurzsky and his little family move from Poland to New York City, and there is an encounter he has that leads to he and Nina meeting the Avengers. It’s not like Erik meant to keep Spiderman from being stuck under an exploding building. He was just trying to keep his daughter safe.

summary:
*December 31st 2019*
Tony: *patiently waits for the clock to turn to 12:00am*
Clock: 11:59
Tony: *walks over to radio*
Clock:...
body:
*December 31st 2019*

Tony: *patiently waits for the clock to turn to 12:00am*

Clock: 11:59

Tony: *walks over to radio*

Clock: 12:00

Tony: hehehehe

*Chorus of Roaring 20s plays at top volume, making everyone in the Avengers Compound bolt up in bed*

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

title: Snapshots of a friendship
body:
by S_Horne

“I don’t know, Steve.” Tony sighed and lifted a shoulder. “You know everything about Rhodey. I just think that you… you’re allowed to talk about him, you know.”

Steve’s brow furrowed. “What’s that supposed to mean?”

“You never tell me anything. You never tell anyone anything. I don’t know if you’re trying to covert him, keep him all for yourself, or if you think that talking about him will only cement the fact that he’s…”

“That he’s what?” Steve said tersely when Tony cut himself off quickly. “That he’s dead?”

Tony flinched, knowing that there was nothing he could say. “I didn’t mean it like that. I just meant that you were allowed to–”

OR

National Brother’s Day

Words: 2396, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 24 of A May Medley

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

reblog.comment:
by S_Horne

“I don’t know, Steve.” Tony sighed and lifted a shoulder. “You know everything about Rhodey. I just think that you… you’re allowed to talk about him, you know.”

Steve’s brow furrowed. “What’s that supposed to mean?”

“You never tell me anything. You never tell anyone anything. I don’t know if you’re trying to covert him, keep him all for yourself, or if you think that talking about him will only cement the fact that he’s…”

“That he’s what?” Steve said tersely when Tony cut himself off quickly. “That he’s dead?”

Tony flinched, knowing that there was nothing he could say. “I didn’t mean it like that. I just meant that you were allowed to–”

title: All I See Is Colour
body:
by jay_girl88

“Steve had always loved to watch Tony’s mind at work. It was a thing of wonder, like getting to see the absolute inner workings of something so complex and advanced that you knew you’d never be all the way caught up to it, but could revel in the work of art that it was anyway. And revel he did, especially in those moments when Tony forgot he was there and his hands became a blur of motion as he manipulated diagrams and shot through calculations with a speed that surpassed even JARVIS’.

But watching him figure out that Steve was irretrievably in love with him? Not so much awe inspiring as it was completely terrifying. More so than anything else in his life.

And Steve had fought goddamn wars.”

~*~*~*~

When Steve lashes out after a misunderstanding, Tony is the one left hurt. Now, a certain super soldier must find a way to apologize, make things right, and then possibly make an epic declaration of love because all this talk of Tony with other people just had to stop. Really.

(Based off this prompt on LJ)

summary: You Chose Wrong, Now Listen To The Tale Of A Wounded Crow And A Triumphant Phoenix
title: You Chose Wrong, Now Listen To The Tale Of A Wounded Crow And A Triumphant Phoenix
body:
by Kathendale

When tasked with choosing who to save, Captain America chose wrong. He left Iron Man, a now broken man, to die alone in a bunker in Siberia, a shield lain at his feet. When Loki appears, Iron Man is more than willing to let the man kill him. Instead, the Frost Giant has an offer. Give him back his life as Tony Stark if he helps him prepare Midgard and Asgard for the coming of Thanos. Will the Man of Iron accept?

Words: 634, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Loki (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, Scott Lang, Clint Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Phil Coulson
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark, one sided Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Phil Coulson, Scott Lang/Sam Wilson
  • Additional Tags: not team Cap friendly, Not Steve Friendly, Scott gets a redemption arc, Sam gets a redemption arc, Clint gets a redemption arc, not wanda maximoff friendly

they couldve kept all the good parts without propping them with awful parts
summary: A timeline where Tony Stark is dead, his toddler grows up without him, Natasha and Gamora are slaughtered, Steve Rogers abandons...
body: A timeline where Tony Stark is dead, his toddler grows up without him, Natasha and Gamora are slaughtered, Steve Rogers abandons his found family and jeopardizes their reality, Peggy Carter’s achievements are nullified, and Bucky loses the two people whose help he still needed is a dark timeline.

reblog.comment: A timeline where Tony Stark is dead, his toddler grows up without him, Natasha and Gamora are slaughtered, Steve Rogers abandons his found family and jeopardizes their reality, Peggy Carter’s achievements are nullified, and Bucky loses the two people whose help he still needed is a dark timeline.
